meanings.sent1: The ancillas cleaned the entire house diligently.
meanings.sent2: The wealthy family hired several ancillas to help with household chores.
meanings.sent3: The ancillas accidentally mixed up the laundry and turned all the clothes pink!
meanings.sent4: She was the queen's most trusted ancillas, always by her side.
meanings.sent5: The ancillas wore traditional uniforms, making them easily recognizable.

meanings.sent1: The manager's ancillas helped organize the files in the office.
meanings.sent2: The CEO relied on his ancillas to schedule his meetings efficiently.
meanings.sent3: The ancillas playfully hid the boss's favorite pen as a prank.
meanings.sent4: She was his right-hand ancillas, always ready to assist him in any task.
meanings.sent5: The ancillas quickly became indispensable to the team with their hard work.
